attributes.additional_details:
Club morsico.  Details were previously leaked about this "club" eating endangered species as what is described ont the website as a rare dining experience.  If this is true, steps need to be taken to prosecute those involved for the trade and import of banned animal produce and shut down the club for good to set an example that the UK will not tolerate the destruction of critically endangered animals for dining pleasure.

Further reading: http://www.clubmorsico.com/the-club/
